product_name: Columbia Fusion Exact Insulated Jacket - Men's
long_description: The waterproof Columbia Fusion Exact(TM) jacket with Omni-Heat(TM) thermal reflective lining, warm insulation and a removable hood let you take on winter weather on ski slopes and mountaintops. Omni-Tech(R) waterproof, breathable nylon shell resists abrasion and breathes well; seams are fully sealed to keep moisture from getting in. Omni-Heat(TM) thermal reflective lining features small silver dots that reflect heat back to your body while dissipating moisture and excess heat to keep you comfortable. Partially recycled polyester insulation keeps you toasty on cold days. Includes zippered hand pockets, a waterproof chest pocket, ski pass pocket, media/goggles pocket and an internal security pocket. Removable, adjustable storm hood; two-way underarm venting. Columbia Fusion Exact(TM) insulated jacket has a drawcord hem, adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs and an adjustable powder skirt to keep out the elements and help retain warmth.
